1370: Jan moved to Cromme straet.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Volcwiif at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Volcwiif, Kolekinus, at age 19.
1371: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Marisseis, at age 20.
1372: Had a son with Volcwiif, Stoethoute, at age 21.
1378: Had a son with Volcwiif, Lutbrandus, at age 27.
1380: Had a son with Volcwiif, Clais, at age 29.
1383: Had a daughter with Volcwiif, Imsoete, at age 32.
1385: Lost daughter Imsoete when Imsoete was 3 years old.
1387: Lost his wife Volcwiif while she was giving birth to Didderic in 1387.
Lost son Didderic when Didderic was 1 years old.
1389: Lost son Clais when Clais was 10 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1390: Lost son Lutbrandus when Lutbrandus was 13 years old.
